title: 94% winrate mmr is not going up

embed.description: jumperer / Bronze 3 76LP / 16W 1L Win Ratio 94% / Cassiopeia - 13W 1L Win Ratio 93%, Vladimir - 2W 0L Win Ratio 100%, Olaf - 1W 0L Win Ratio 100%

body:
Recently I have been loosing the motivation to play ranked at all. The new ranked system is really hard to rank up in. Last season my Acc was bronze 1 and pre season silver 4.
I play my placement matches and win 9 of 10 games and place in bronze 4.
I am still in bronze 3 with a 94% winrate 16 wins and 1 loss yet my mmr has barely changed since the first match.
If you look at the first match i played the average rank of the teams was iron 1, and now 16 wins 1 losses later I am still getting matches against an average of bronze 4 meaning my mmr has only gone up by 1 rank even though iam i n bronze 3 now and only getting 18 LP per win. No skipping ranks no nothing.

I like to give ranked matches my full effort and only receiving so little gain from my handwork is very demotivating and thus i just play casual and troll here and there.

I honestly dont have to energy to play ranked anymore if i am not going to be rewarded for my handwork.

replies.body: How much LP are you getting per win?
Hey mate I added you in game, send me a message when you jump on. Cheers
